products.title: Napier White
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Napier White Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 2040mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 3000mm
 	Note: This is a patterned fabric, white pattern on a white background.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
